headline: Marathon Petroleum (MPC) Advances While Market Declines: Some Information for Investors
summary: The latest trading day saw Marathon Petroleum (MPC) settling at $170.08, representing a +1.98% change from its previous close.

headline: Energy Stocks Have Had a Mixed Start to 2025. Natural Gas Is Hot and Oil Is Not.
summary: The energy sector is holding its own with the S&P 500, thanks to surging natural gas stocks. Oil stocks may start to catch up though.
